name: Sans Asterism
description:
At the end of time, there's a prawn. This prawn believes that the universe should end. An entity with the name Smiln also exists, opposing the prawn and its ideals. As the prawn wants the universe to die with everything in it, Smiln plans to bring the last planet into the next universe. With the end getting near, the prawn makes its move to destroy Smiln and let this planet die with the universe.

Made for Rev Game Jam2: https://itch.io/jam/rev-jam-2

Tips:

  • You must defeat all enemies in all timelines to win an encounter.
  • You can restart or leave a battle at any time by pausing the game.
  • Defeating certain enemies unlocks specific abilities that may help you.

Controls:

  • Interact - Z
  • Cancel - X
  • Move - Arrow Keys
  • Pause - Escape
  • Cheat - Numberpad 9

Configurable controls may be added in a future patch.

Credits

  • LilJerry - Music
  • Jellonator - Programming
  • Rodunkus - Art
